productDescription: Upper Material / Sole Material : Canvas and Synthetic / Airmix Lifestyle: Loafers & Moccasins / Casual / Sneakers Toe Style / Closure : Round Toe / Slip On Padded FootBed, Cushioned Ankle, Fully adjustable straps, Shock-absorbing Anti-Skate sole Care Instructions: Allow your pair of shoes to air and de-odorize at regular basis; use shoe bags to prevent any stains or mildew; dust any dry dirt from the surface using a clean cloth; do not use polish or shiner
